price: 33. O, jullie die geloven! Gehoorzaam Allah en gehoorzaam de boodschapper en maak jullie daden niet nutteloos.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
